## Description
The Large Areothermal Well is an geothermal energy production system&#10;that features more advance geothermal flow path for ground loop design for&#10;capturing heat and creating electricity.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Category:|Power|
|Construction:|PRE_FABRICATED|
|Size:|10.0 x 15.0 m|
|Level:|0|
|Maintenance Period:|200|
|Power Demands:|0.1 kW|
|Offline Power Demands:|0.01 kW|
|Construction:|[Large Areothermal Well](/docs/definitions/construction/large-areothermal-well)|

- POWER_GENERATION
- POWER_STORAGE
